Rhapsody II: Ballad of the Little Princess Original Soundtrack

Catalog Number RHP3-GDS-EU-OST1 Release Date Aug 29, 2023 Publish Format Commercial, Enclosure Release Price 66.66 GBP (Package Price) Media Format 2 CD Classification Original Soundtrack, Vocal PublisherNIS America / NIS America / NIS America

Notes

Enclosed with Rhapsody: Marl Kingdom Chronicles - Limited Edition for the Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 5

Composer, Arranger, Programming: Tenpei Sato
